Set up data for remi
```{r}
cellexp.list <- setupData(adeno.data, cellmarkers, 2, filter=T)
remi.interactome <- remi(cellmarkers, cellexp.list)
```

Visualize interactome players 
```{r}
ChordPlot(remi.interactome)
```
